Class: Balances

Balances

Any balance on the blockchain is simply a summation of unspent outputs. Unlike other queries in Chain Core, balance queries do not return Chain Core objects, only simple sums over the amount fields in a specified list of unspent output objects

More info: https://chain.com/docs/core/build-applications/queries

new Balances(client)

constructor - return Balances object configured for specified Chain Core.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
client Client Configured Chain client object.

Methods

query(params [, callback])

Get one page of balances matching the specified query.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
params Query {} Filter and pagination information.
callback pageCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Requested page of results.
Type
Promise.<Page>

queryAll(params, processor)

Request all balances matching the specified query, calling the supplied processor callback with each item individually.
Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
params Query {} Filter and pagination information.
processor QueryProcessor Processing callback.
Returns:
A promise resolved upon processing of all items, or rejected on error.
Type
Promise
